Account.description: Guid ID of account that is linked to the project

AccountName.description: Name of account that is linked to the project

AmountFC.description: Calculated amount of the transaction based on (Quantity * PriceFC)

Attachment.description: Attachment linked to the transaction (not mandatory)

Created.description: Date and time the transaction was created

Creator.description: The Guid ID of user that created the transaction

CreatorFullName.description: The full name of the user that created the record

CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

Date.description: Date and time the transaction was done

Employee.description: Guid ID of the employee that is linked to the transaction

EndTime.description: End time of the time transaction

EntryNumber.description: Number that represents the grouping of transactions

ErrorText.description: (Only used by backgroundjobs) To determine which transaction has an error

HourStatus.description: Status of the transaction: 1 = Draft, 2 = Rejected, 10 = Submitted, 11 = Failed on approval, 14 = Processing, 16 = Processing, 19 = Failed while undoing approval, 20 = Final

Item.description: Item that is linked to the transaction, which provides the time or cost information

ItemDescription.description: Description of the item that is linked to the transaction

ItemDivisable.description: Indicates if fractional quantities of the item can be used, for example quantity = 0.4

Modified.description: The date and time transaction record was modified

Modifier.description: The Guid ID of the user that modified the records

ModifierFullName.description: The full name of the user that modified the record

Notes.description: Notes linked to the transaction for providing additional information (not mandatory)

PriceFC.description: For use in AmountFC (Quantiy * Price FC)

Project.description: Guid ID of project that is linked to the transaction

ProjectAccount.description: Project account ID that is linked to the transaction (not mandatory)

ProjectAccountCode.description: Project account code that is linked to the transaction

ProjectAccountName.description: Project account name that is linked to the transaction

ProjectCode.description: Project code that is linked to the transaction

ProjectDescription.description: Project description that is linked to the transaction

Quantity.description: Quantity of the item that is linked to the transaction

StartTime.description: Start time of the time transaction

Subscription.description: Guid ID of subscription that is linked to the transaction

SubscriptionAccount.description: Subscription account ID that is linked to the transaction, this is to identify the referenced subscription

SubscriptionAccountCode.description: Subscription account code that is linked to the transaction

SubscriptionAccountName.description: Subscription account name that is linked to the transaction

SubscriptionDescription.description: Subscription description that is linked to the transaction

SubscriptionNumber.description: Subscription number that is linked to the transaction

Type.description: The type of transaction. E.g: 1 = Time, 2 = Cost

WBS.description: Guid ID of activity for time transaction or expense for cost transaction that is linked to project WBS (work breakdown structure)

WBSDescription.description: Name of activity for time transaction or expense for cost transaction that is linked to project WBS (work breakdown structure)
